races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Dragonborn look very much like dragons standing erect in humanoid form, though they lack wings or a tail. They are known for their strength, pride, and draconic heritage.

subraces.name: White Dragonborn
subraces.description: White dragonborn are descended from white dragons, known for their icy breath and affinity with cold. They are often cold and aloof, reflecting the harshness of their draconic ancestors.

subraces.name: Black Dragonborn
subraces.description: Black dragonborn are descended from black dragons, renowned for their acid breath and cunning. They are often calculating and sneaky, embodying the traits of their draconic heritage.

subraces.name: Red Dragonborn
subraces.description: Red dragonborn are descendants of red dragons, known for their fiery breath and dominant personalities. They tend to be proud, aggressive, and confident in their abilities.

subraces.name: Blue Dragonborn
subraces.description: Blue dragonborn are descended from blue dragons, famous for their lightning breath and fiery, passionate nature. They are often fiercely territorial and proud.

subraces.name: Green Dragonborn
subraces.description: Green dragonborn are descended from green dragons, characterized by their toxic breath and manipulative demeanor. They are often sly, charismatic, and deceptive.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal. They are strong, durable, and deeply dedicated to their clans and traditions.

subraces.name: Hill Dwarf
subraces.description: As a hill dwarf, you have keen senses, deep intuition, and remarkable resilience.

subraces.name: Mountain Dwarf
subraces.description: As a mountain dwarf, you're strong and hardy, accustomed to a difficult life in rugged terrain.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it. They are known for their keen senses, proficiency with a bow, and their connection to nature.

subraces.name: High Elf
subraces.description: As a high elf, you have a keen mind and a mastery of at least the basics of magic.

subraces.name: Wood Elf
subraces.description: As a wood elf, you have keen senses and intuition, and your fleet feet carry you quickly and stealthily through your native forests.

subraces.name: Drow (Dark Elf)
subraces.description: Descended from an earlier subrace of dark-skinned elves, the drow are now a race of their own, dwelling in the Underdark.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: A gnomeâ€™s energy and enthusiasm for living shines through every inch of their tiny body. Gnomes are quick-witted, curious, and often craft skilled tinkerers or illusionists.

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
subraces.description: As a forest gnome, you have a natural knack for illusion and inherent quickness and stealth.

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
subraces.description: As a rock gnome, you have a natural inventiveness and hardiness beyond that of other gnomes.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Half-elves combine what some say are the best qualities of their elf and human parents. They are charismatic, versatile, and adaptive, though they lack defined subraces.

subraces.name: High Half-Elf
subraces.description: As a high half-elf, you are blessed with the grace and poise of your elven ancestry, and a keen mind that allows you to learn magic and culture with ease.

subraces.name: Wood Half-Elf
subraces.description: As a wood half-elf, you inherit the stealth, dexterity, and adaptability of wood elves, blending into natural environments with ease.

subraces.name: Drow Half-Elf
subraces.description: As a drow half-elf, you combine the mystique and shadowy allure of the drow with the adaptability and resilience of your human heritage.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Half-orcs are known for their physical strength and resilience. They often live between human and orc societies, struggling to find a place but always commanding respect for their might.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: The diminutive halflings survive in a world full of larger creatures by avoiding notice or, barring that, avoiding offense. They are known for their courage and their incredibly lucky nature.

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
subraces.description: As a lightfoot halfling, you are nimble and stealthy, making you a naturally adept adventurer.

subraces.name: Stout Halfling
subraces.description: As a stout halfling, you're hardier than average and have a strong resistance to poison.

races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. They have widely varying tastes, morals, and customs depending on the region they hail from.

subraces.name: Standard Human
subraces.description: Standard humans are versatile and come in many shapes and forms, making them well-rounded and adaptable.

subraces.name: Variant Human
subraces.description: Variant humans get a customizable feature set and feat at 1st level, providing more versatility than the standard human.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Tieflings inherit the fiendish bloodline from ancient pacts or infernal ancestors. They often bear horns, tails, and other infernal features, but many seek to rise above their dark heritage.

subraces.name: Asmodeus Tiefling
subraces.description: Asmodeus tieflings are the most common type of tiefling, descended from the archdevil Asmodeus. They possess infernal power and a natural charisma that can be used for manipulation or leadership.

subraces.name: Mephistopheles Tiefling
subraces.description: Mephistopheles tieflings are descended from the archdevil Mephistopheles, gaining powers related to cold and fire, along with an air of intellect and manipulation.

subraces.name: Zariel Tiefling
subraces.description: Zariel tieflings are descended from the archdevil Zariel, embodying both strength and fiery rage, with a deep connection to celestial warfare and a desire to lead in battle.
